# SAVEMIGRATION::SAVEMIGRATION_MP_GET_STATUS

## Summary
Get the current status of the users save migration, if it returns SAVEMIGRATION_STATUS_OK if the user can enter a multiplayer session

## Returns
* **SAVEMIGRATION_STATUS_CODES**
